title: Lawmakers Announce Outline to Ban Russian Oil
itunes:title: Lawmakers Announce Outline to Ban Russian Oil
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Host Joe Mathieu spoke with Patrick DeHaan, Head of Petroleum analysis at Gas Buddy, Kriti Gupta, Bloomberg Markets Correspondent, Michael Kimmage, History Dept Chair at Catholic University, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
